scripts.scrape:pubs: node scripts/scrape_faculty_pubs.mjs --discipline "Community Health and Humanities" --years all --formats all --types all --out public/data/faculty_pubs.json
scripts.scrape:pubs:headful: node scripts/scrape_faculty_pubs.mjs --discipline "Community Health and Humanities" --years all --formats all --types all --out public/data/faculty_pubs.json --headful
